# IR News

We use cookies to improve your experience on our website, to record customer access logs on the site, and to provide social media features. For details on Cookies, please visit our Cookie Policy. [Cookie Policy](https://www.td-holdings.co.jp/en/information/usage.html)

Cookie Settings OK

  * ### Cookie Notice

  * ### Strictly Necessary Cookies

  * ### Performance Cookies

  * ### Targeting Cookies




#### Cookie Notice

When you visit our website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalised web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings below to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. [More information](https://www.td-holdings.co.jp/en/information/usage.html)

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

Cookies Details‎

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

Cookies Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Cookies Details‎

# Integrated Reports

The Integrated Report is intended to foster understanding of the T&D Insurance Group among shareholders and investors, by encapsulating important information on elements such as financial information, non-financial information, and company information.

## Integrated Report 2024

Year Ended March 31, 2024

The purpose of this report is to give a clear briefing, from both financial and non-financial perspectives, about how the T&D Insurance Group’s business and actions are linked to the Group’s medium- to long-term growth, and to value creation for all our stakeholders. This time, we will convey our group's competitive advantage resources and value creation strategies based on the Group's Corporate Philosophy. 

### PDF

_Download Full Report_

  * [Integrated Report 2024 (PDF:11.8MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2024e.pdf)



_Download Each Section_

  * [Introduction (PDF:1.82MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2024e_s0.pdf)
    * Editorial Policy/Contents
    * To Be a Group That Moves as One…
    * Origins of T&D-History of “Try & Discover” Motto of Taiyo Life and Daido Life
    * T&D’s Trajectory of Value Creation
  * [Value Creation Story(PDF:3.97MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2024e_s1.pdf)
    * Top Message
    * Value Creation Process
    * Business Portfolio
    * Financial Capital
    * Intellectual Capital
    * Human Capital
    * Social and Relationship Capital
    * Natural Capital
  * [Value Creation Strategy and Performance (PDF:3.90MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2024e_s2.pdf)
    * Group Long-Term Vision “Try & Discover 2025”
    * Sustainability Management
    * Materiality (Sustainability Priority Themes)
    * Sustainability Advisory Committee
    * Business Strategies (Life Insurance Business)
    * Life Insurance Business
    * Closed Book Business
    * Asset Management Business
    * Non-life Insurance Business
    * New Sector
    * Closed Book Business Dialogue
  * [Framework for Continuous Value Creation (PDF:2.32MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2024e_s3.pdf)
    * Corporate Governance
    * Compliance
    * Management Organization
    * Interview with the Chair of the Nomination and Compensation Committee
    * Messages from New Directors
    * Stakeholder Engagement
  * [Corporate Data (PDF:1.61MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2024e_s4.pdf)
    * Financial Highlights
    * Non-financial Highlights
    * Selected Financial Data
    * Overview of the Life Insurance Business (Market)
    * Glossary
    * Status of Stock Holdings
    * Stock Information
    * Group Companies
    * Corporate Overview



![](/en/ir/document/images/annual_photo_24.jpg)

## Integrated Report 2023

Year Ended March 31, 2023

### PDF

_Download Full Report_

  * [Integrated Report 2023 (PDF:10.5MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2023e.pdf)



_Download Each Section_

  * [Introduction (PDF:1.75MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2023e_s0.pdf)
  * [Strategies to Realize the Group's Corporate Philosophy(PDF:2.36MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2023e_s1.pdf)
  * [Sustainablity Management (PDF:2.82MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2023e_s2.pdf)
  * [ERM (PDF:810KB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2023e_s3.pdf)
  * [Corporate Governance (PDF:2.12MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2023e_s4.pdf)
  * [Supplementary Materials and Corporate Data (PDF:1.28MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2023e_s5.pdf)



![](/en/ir/document/images/annual_photo_23.jpg)

## Integrated Report 2022

Year Ended March 31, 2022

### PDF

_Download Full Report_

  * [Integrated Report 2022 (PDF:7.77MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2022e.pdf)



_Download Each Section_

  * [Foreword (PDF:1.37MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2022e_s0.pdf)
  * [CHAPTER 01 Working toward the T&D Insurance Group’s Vision for Society(PDF:2.21MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2022e_s1.pdf)
  * [CHAPTER 02 Try & Discover for Creation of Shared Value (PDF:2.77MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2022e_s2.pdf)
  * [CHAPTER 03 Further Advancement of Capital and Risk Management (PDF:2.15MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2022e_s3.pdf)
  * [CHAPTER 04 Corporate Governance (PDF:1.48MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2022e_s4.pdf)
  * [CHAPTER 05 T&D Insurance Group’s Business (PDF:846KB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2022e_s5.pdf)
  * [CHAPTER 06 Supplementary Materials and Corporate Data (PDF:788KB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2022e_s6.pdf)



![](/en/ir/document/images/annual_photo_22.jpg)

## Integrated Report 2021

Year Ended March 31, 2021

### PDF

_Download Full Report_

  * [Integrated Report 2021 (PDF:13.40MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2021e.pdf)



_Download Each Section_

  * [Overview of the T&D Insurance Group (PDF:2.34MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2021e_s0.pdf)
  * [Try & Discover for Creation of Shared Value (PDF:3.21MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2021e_s1.pdf)
  * [Further Advancement of Capital and Risk Management (PDF:1.61MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2021e_s2.pdf)
  * [Corporate Governance (PDF:2.42MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2021e_s3.pdf)
  * [Supplementary Materials (PDF:539KB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2021e_s4.pdf)
  * [Corporate Data (PDF:1.85MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ar2021e_s5.pdf)



![](/en/ir/document/images/annual_photo_21.jpg)

## Integrated Report 2020

Year Ended March 31, 2020

### PDF

_Download Full Report_

  * [Integrated Report 2020 (PDF:7.20MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2020e.pdf)



_Download Each Section_

  * [Overview of the T&D Insurance Group (PDF:1.18MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2020e_s1.pdf)
  * [Try & Discover for Creation of Shared Value (PDF:3.88MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2020e_s2.pdf)
  * [Foundations for the Creation of Shared Value (PDF:1.78MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2020e_s3.pdf)

  * [Corporate Data (PDF:1.23MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/ir2020e_s5.pdf)

# Consolidated Financial Statements

## FY2023 Consolidated Financial Statements

  * [Consolidated Financial Statements 2024 (PDF:1.04MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/cfs2024_s1.pdf)



## FY2022 Consolidated Financial Statements

  * [Consolidated Financial Statements 2023 (PDF:5.04MB)![\(PDF\)](/common/images/link_icon_pdf.png)](/en/ir/document/pdf/cfs2023_s1.pdf)



## FY2021 Consolidated Financial Statements

We use cookies to improve your experience on our website, to record customer access logs on the site, and to provide social media features. For details on Cookies, please visit our Cookie Policy. [Cookie Policy](https://www.td-holdings.co.jp/en/information/usage.html)

Cookie Settings OK

  * ### Cookie Notice

  * ### Strictly Necessary Cookies

  * ### Performance Cookies

  * ### Targeting Cookies




#### Cookie Notice

When you visit our website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalised web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings below to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. [More information](https://www.td-holdings.co.jp/en/information/usage.html)

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

Cookies Details‎

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

Cookies Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Cookies Details‎
